title: Sara Dane
creator_credit: Jock Blair and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Based on the best selling novel by Catherine Gaskin, “Sara Dane” portrays the rags to riches story of a young servant girl transported to New South Wales for a crime she did not commit. Rated: PG
